Name: Wingal
Effect: On Play - [Discard a Royal Paladin card] Add a "Blaster Blade" or "King of Knights, Alfred" from your deck to your hand.

Name: Flash Shield, Iseult
Effect: [Overcast][Quick]n/Deal 2 damage to an opposing Unit. Valor 5: Deal 3 damage instead.

Name: Yggdrasil Maiden, Elaine
Effect: On Play - Heal X to your Leader. X equals the number of allied Royal Paladin Units.

Name: High Dog Breeder, Akane
Effect: On Play - [Overcast][(2)] Summon a Level 2 or lower High Beast Unit from your deck.

Name: Pongal
Effect: If a Unit was played by an allied effect this turn, this Unit gains Rush. Valor 10: Gain Blitz instead.

Name: Margal
Effect: On Play - [Discard a Royal Paladin card] Draw 1.n/On Destroy - Valor 7: Draw 1.

Name: Future Knight, Llew
Effect: On Play - [Rest a High Beast & destroy this Unit] Summon a Blaster Blade from your deck.

Name: Blaster Blade
Effect: On Play - Deal X damage to an opposing Unit. X equals the number of allied Units. Valor 10: Double this damage

Name: Swordman of Explosive Flames, Palamedes
Effect: [Rush]n/On Play - Gain +1/+1 for every 2 allied Units.

Name: King of Knights, Alfred
Effect: [Exceed 3 - "Blaster Blade"]n/On Play - Summon a Level 2 or lower Royal Paladin Unit from your deck and give it +1/+1. If this Unit Exceeded, summon a Level 4 or lower Royal Paladin Unit instead.

Name: Soul Saver Dragon
Effect: On Play - Give all other allied Royal Paladin Units +2/+2.
